Message:
I wonder when it was that
Lucille and I first met...

We’ve been inseparable
for so long,
I can’t even remember.

In a slum where
abandoned witches gathered,
Lucille looked after all of us
orphans as our leader.

But, the other orphans all died
from starvation or illness...
Only the two of us were left...

As my consciousness
began to slip away,
I stretched my hand
towards Lucille.

“I’m right here...
I’ll live and die...by your side...”

In that moment, I thought...
as long as Lucille
was beside me,
even death itself
no longer seemed scary...

Just before my
consciousness faded,
I felt as though I heard a voice
calling out to us
in the distance...
